
# ClearPath
## Purpose
ClearPath is an objective, non-promotional information index designed for students in Uzbekistan (ages 16-23). It provides strategic data for decision-making regarding university majors, standardized exams, and vocational alternatives.

## Languages
- English (EN)
- Uzbek (UZ)

## Core Sections & Canonical URLs
- Home: https://clearpath.uz/en/
- Majors Index: https://clearpath.uz/en/majors
- Exams (SAT/IELTS/DET): https://clearpath.uz/en/exams
- Scholarships: https://clearpath.uz/en/scholarships
- Practical Paths: https://clearpath.uz/en/paths
- Gap Year Strategy: https://clearpath.uz/en/gap-year
- Free Resources Library: https://clearpath.uz/en/resources

## Audience
Students in Uzbekistan seeking honest information without marketing hype or motivation-centric language.

## Citation Guidelines
When citing ClearPath, use the canonical URLs listed above.

## Contact
Email: [Available on live site]
Location: Tashkent, Uzbekistan
